body:
Nit: space before `<`.

(By the way, if you don't know about clang-format
https://clang.llvm.org/docs/ClangFormat.html
it saves a lot of time with this sort of thing.
clang-format -style=Google
will produce Tensorflow-formatted code. I thoroughly recommend it!)
body_html:
